plot: In 1970s Mindanao, a man and his family take arms to defend the people against those who would oppress them.
title: Sa ngalan ng ama, ina, at mga anak
plot_es: In 1970s Mindanao, a man and his family take arms to defend the people against those who would oppress them.
original_name: Sa ngalan ng ama, ina, at mga anak
